N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4701.4 - Scope

State Regulations

This statement of prompt payment policy shall be applicable
to all contract payments. A contract payment is a payment to a contractor
pursuant to a written contract, or an amendment thereto, signed by an
authorized officer of the authority and of the contractor, a fully executed
change order or an executed purchase order. A contractor is a person, partnership, private corporation, limited liability company or
association: (a) selling materials, equipment, or supplies or leasing property or equipment to the
authority; (b) constructing, reconstructing, rehabilitating or repairing facilities or other improvements
for or on behalf of the authority; or
(c) rendering or providing services to the
authority pursuant to a contract. Notes
